references.paper_title: Conditional simulation using diffusion schrödinger bridges
references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational concept of diffusion Schrödinger bridges, a key technique utilized and extended in the current research.
This paper presents a significant advancement in image-to-image translation using diffusion models, directly influencing the current work's approach and experimental setup.
This paper introduces Denoising Diffusion Bridge Models (DDBM), a specific type of diffusion bridge model that is directly compared and contrasted with in the present study.
This paper offers another significant method for accelerating diffusion bridge models, providing a crucial comparative point for assessing the efficiency and novelty of the proposed technique.
This work provides an alternative acceleration approach for diffusion bridge models, serving as a benchmark against which the performance of the new method is evaluated and contextualized.
